metadata.title: Toasty Space Quest: Sir Toasterton's Tale
metadata.author: Grok
metadata.description: A whimsical first-person adventure where you, Sir Toasterton IV, a sentient slice of toast, pilot the Toasty 56 through a culinary galaxy, facing butter asteroids, butter pirates, and personal regrets.

2.content: You are Sir Toasterton IV, from a long line of adventurers.
2.name: Start

3.content: Your parents gifted you the Toasty 56 for your 31st birthday. What do you do?
3.name: Home - Go or stay

4.content: You put it in storage and continue life. But the spark is missing - you continue this for 3 years, until…
4.name: Home - Stay

5.content: A Butterstroid appears – mining quickly starts up and a lot of people start to get fat.
5.name: Home - Butterstroid Appears

6.content: You jump in your ship and go right up – it’s easy to load in huge amounts into your cargo bay.
6.name: Home - Butterstroid Go

7.content: You can't control yourself though - this close to the butter, you just can't stop! You keep eating and eating, day after day.
7.name: Home - Butterstroid Land

8.content: After a few weeks your starch can't absorb any more butter - your body is at its limit.
8.name: Home - Butterstroid Stay

9.content: You lay on the ground unable to move – soon your body shuts down completely. You drift around the butterstroid for another few weeks before…
9.name: Home - Butterstroid Death

10.content: Your body is recovered and buried in the family plot on Breadtopia.
10.name: Death - Family Plot

11.content: The butterstroid was a fad for 10 months... until
11.name: Home - Fad

12.content: Butter Hungry Bagel Pirates appeared - they'd been tracking this butterstroid for decades and weren't about to let us continue eating their profits.
12.name: Home - Pirates Appear

13.content: The people call for a hero brave enough to fight the pirates off. They need someone with a spaceship and the guts to stand up to the massive pirate ship.
13.name: Home - Pirates Choice

14.content: You assume someone else will take care of the problem - and so does everyone else. The pirates, unopposed, get ready to haul the butterstroid away. It was nice – but not worth dying for.
14.name: Home - Pirates Unopposed

15.content: The pirates took the butterstroid and leave.
15.name: Home - Pirates Haul

16.content: You continue on for 50 years - looking for something you really care about...
16.name: Home - Old Toast

17.content: One night as you walk the streets of Toast Town, you can feel that your time is almost up and you regret your choices. You remember that spaceship you still own. It’s not too late for adventure!
17.name: Home - Old 2

18.content: It takes a bit of messing around to figure out the controls, but before long the Toasty 56 is up and leaving Breadtopia.
18.name: Home - Old Space

19.content: You push down the throttle – but the sudden speed and pressure are too much for your body at this age...
19.name: Home - Old Space 2

20.content: You die and float through space for just over 11 years before...
20.name: Home - Drift 2

21.content: You answer the call – and activate your Toasty 56 to come and pick you up! You’re ready to face those evil butter crazed pirates.
21.name: Home - Answer Pirates

22.content: You take Toasty 56 right up to the Pirate Ship, and notice just how massive it truly is.
22.name: Home - Pirates Confront

23.content: Nothing happens – turns out you shouldn’t have just charged up here with a ship that’s been sitting in storage for years.
23.name: Home - Dud Ship

24.content: The pirate ship slips behind you - turns out it was just charging it's laser cannon. Ironically the shot misses your ship by a few meters ......
24.name: Home - Pirates Laser

25.content: but the radiation cooks you anyway and you die.
25.name: Home-Cooked

26.content: The pirates made off with the butter with no other resistance.
26.name: Pirates Steal Butterstroid

27.content: Your dead body drifted space for 5 years before…
27.name: Home - Drift

28.content: You follow your gut and start out on your adventure! You live a happy and fulfilling life. Good for you I guess.
28.name: Home - Adventure

29.content:
END OF DEMO - I hope you enjoyed it! 
More to come as I have time :)
29.name: DEMO END

30.content: What air freshy do you wanna huff?
30.name: Air Freshener

31.content: SNORF SNORF - Mint is never gonna get old
31.name: Air - Mint

32.content: SNORF SNORF - Apple is all I can smell now.....
32.name: Air - Apple

33.content: SNORF SNORF - Dragon Fruit or bust BABYYYY
33.name: Air - Dragonfruit

34.content: OH Crumble my biscuits - I forgot about the butter belt. No amount of fresh air goodness is gonna get me out of this mess!
34.name: BB - Start

35.content: I have a few options, but this is starting to feel pretty dangerous.
35.name: BB - What to do

36.content: oh shittt - it's a butterstroid! While I was thinking about what to do it must have slipped behind me! That thing is massive! What should I do?
36.name: BB - Encounter Behind

37.content: I fire the beta laser but it has no effect at all!
37.name: BB - Encounter Behind Fire

38.content: You make it around the butterstroid and head right back to Breadtopia. You are done with trying to be an adventurer - it's just too dangerous.
38.name: Home - Back from BB

39.content: You make it around the outside edge of the butter belt - it puts your nerves to the test a few times but you make it through.
39.name: BB - Edge Choice

40.name: Wooden Jam
40.content: What a wonderfully rendered jar of jam - woody flavor!

41.name: Wooden Butter
41.content: What a wonderfully rendered tub of butter. Oh man, I wish I could rub myself down with some of that good farm raised butter.

42.name: Wooden Toaster
42.content: What a wonderfully rendered toaster. Now I have a wooden toaster inside my toasty!

43.content: Just when you started making progress through the center of the belt, you notice a massive butterstroid looming towards you.
43.name: BB - Encounter Ahead

44.content: You fire your alpha beam at full power - you want to believe something will happen but after 30 seconds you don't notice any difference.
44.name: BB - Encounter Ahead Fire

45.content: You can't control yourself though - this close to the butter, you just can't stop! You keep eating and eating, day after day.
45.name: BB - Butterstroid Land

46.content: After a few weeks your starch can't absorb any more butter - your body is at its limit.
46.name: BB - Butterstroid Stay

47.content: You lay on the ground unable to move – soon your body shuts down completely. You drift around the butterstroid for another few weeks before…
47.name: BB - Butterstroid Dead

48.name: After BB
48.content: It took awhile but you're finally clear of the butterbelt. This is where the adventure should truly begin!

49.name: After BB Choice
49.content: You check your viewscreen and see a massive pirate ship. You can try to approach them, or can go the other way instead.

50.name: Pirate - Apprach
50.content: The pirate ship see's you moving towards them and easily outmaneuvers you and gets behind your ship.

51.name: After BB Choice
51.content: No point picking a fight if you don't have to! You see the direction of the pirate ship and go the other way - full speed ahead!

52.name: Jam - First
52.content: You've been flying for a little over a day now since you saw the pirate ship. Your food supplies are starting to get low.

53.name: Jam - Encounter
53.content: Another day and you're starving - or at least feel like you are! But you finally come across a habitable planet. This is your chance to restock your supplies.

54.name: Jam - Encounter Scan
54.content: You don't pick up any life signs, the only reading is the mass of organic goo that covers the entire planet. It might be edible, or at least you hope.

55.name: Jam - Encounter After Scan
55.content: The reading show that there's a single source of potential food - strange that there aren't any life forms already taking advantage of it.
